verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
Holy Lord most holy Lord
You alone are worthy Of my praise
Holy Lord most holy Lord
With all of my Heart I sing

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Great are You Lord
Worthy of praise
Holy and true
Great are You Lord
Most holy Lord
